title: Testimony of Two Men
overview: Based on the novel by Taylor Caldwell, this star-studded series follows the saga of Dr. Jonathan Ferrier. In post-Civil War Pennsylvania, he relentlessly campaigns to improve the antiquated medical practices in his hometown. Ferrier faces fervent opposition from the town's old guard, who endeavor to destroy his career, and he becomes engulfed in a series of doomed romances and family disputes.
